name: mern-traversy
description: A shopping application built with the MERN stack through Traversy Media's tutorial.

scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=dev || set "NODE_ENV=dev" && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run heroku-postbuild --prefix client
